name: Plura (formerly Bloom Community)
headline: The social app for edge-of-culture communities
description:
Plura (formerly Bloom Community) is a YCombinator backed startup based in Oakland, CA on a mission to use software to bring people together. Plura is a social and dating community that helps you meet new friends and partners organically through shared events and experiences. We partner with local event producers to help you connect and chat with other attendees before and after events. And, with a strong consent culture and referral-based community, we're the safest place to meet new partners and friends. 

The team is led by Luna Ray. Luna spent 5 years at Facebook, most recently leading viral user growth for Instagram from 700M to past a billion users in two years.

founders.name: Lauren (Luna) Ray Vegter, Founder
founders.description:
Lauren (Luna) Ray Vegter is the founder and chair of Plura. Plura helps people meet at in-person events and build community. Since replacing herself as CEO, Luna coaches startup founders using best practices from YC, Instagram, and Faire. 

Previously, Luna led User Acquisition for Instagram from 700M to 1.1B people and launched VR for Oculus. She has two MIT degrees in business and engineering. Luna has trained in multiple coaching modalities including Hakomi Somatics and IFS.

# Find your people
Through real life interactions and shared experiences Plura helps people connect, play, and belong.
[![Apple App Store](https://landen.imgix.net/shared/apple-en.png)](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/id1528252601>)[![Apple App Store](https://landen.imgix.net/shared/google-play-en.png?trim=auto)](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=community.together.bloom>)
## Finally found my people
![5.5 inch 2.png](https://www.heyplura.com/lib_QYpvDeTFJUyyRlZU/k4m6bfzztf70paf7.png?w=350&h=350)
### Start with meeting
Want to meet people? Skip the swiping and ghosting and choose from dozens of events happening in your city every week. 
[See spotlight events](https://www.heyplura.com/</superbloomer-events>)
![5.5 inch 3.png](https://www.heyplura.com/lib_QYpvDeTFJUyyRlZU/k89z8cinqbi8fzri.png?w=350&h=350)
### Continue with matching
Make plans to meet at the event, follow up and continue the connection after the event is done. No more missed connections
![5.5 inch 4.png](https://www.heyplura.com/lib_QYpvDeTFJUyyRlZU/zrbsnjuwx6p9x745.png?w=350&h=350)
### Find your community on Plura
Pod, lover, forever-partner, festival-bestie, etc.. etc.. etc..
![SoulPlay Promo.png](https://www.heyplura.com/lib_QYpvDeTFJUyyRlZU/4hqqghjkve11qd3x.png?w=274&h=574&fit=crop)
![](https://www.heyplura.com/lib_QYpvDeTFJUyyRlZU/jbjcr8wr2w0r9ho9.png?w=274&h=574&fit=crop)
![](https://www.heyplura.com/lib_QYpvDeTFJUyyRlZU/3shj8uujycz0xnse.png?w=274&h=574&fit=crop)
## Stay updated on events and happenings

[![Screen Shot 2022-10-05 at 12.11.03 PM.png](https://www.heyplura.com/lib_QYpvDeTFJUyyRlZU/y8oynhmegaa51dyr.png?w=600&h=275&fit=crop)SoulPlay FestivalCalifornia](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/bl.ooo/m/org/soulplay>)

Queer munches, poly happy hours, sex education workshops, consent discussion groups, rope jams, family picnics, sober festivals, and more.
[![8.png](https://www.heyplura.com/lib_QYpvDeTFJUyyRlZU/64x0xegev46nzzb6.png?w=400&h=200&fit=crop)Non-Monogamous EventsCheck out events in the Bay Area](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/bloomcommunity.com/sf-bay-area-polyamory>)

## Add your Event to Plura
Get started adding your events to Plura by click the button below.
[Add your Event](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/bl.ooo/manage>)
[![Apple App Store](https://landen.imgix.net/shared/apple-en.png)](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/id1528252601>)[![Apple App Store](https://landen.imgix.net/shared/google-play-en.png?trim=auto)](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=community.together.bloom>)
## See what members have to say about us!
Building community is very important to me and Plura helped me do that in a way I wouldn't be able to find anywhere else. Plus, the Plura Team is responsive and professional - they were able to get my concerts into the system quickly so attendees could meet each other and connect.
[Rachel Lark,Singer/Songwriter](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/www.rachellark.com/>)
As an event producer we couldn’t ask for more in a collaboration. It was a win/win/win all around. As a community based in creating connections Plura was a perfect fit for our participants.
[Misha Bonaventura,Bonobo Network](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/bonobonetwork.com/>)
Our recent partnership with Plura has added a new dimension to our events. Not only does Plura increase the peer-driven awareness of the events, it creates a sense of community and belonging. We love the new level of sharing and interactivity that Plura provides.
[Cal Callahan,Leather & LGBTQ Cultural District](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/sfleatherdistrict.org/>)
We have had such a positive experience sharing our wellness events on Plura. We've had incredible people discover our workshops and weekend retreats through Plura - these people are open-hearted, engaged, and so aligned with our mission of developing a deeper sense of community. Plura has had a direct impact on our ticket sales and our growing community.
[Libby Craig,The Optimist Collective](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/www.theoptimistcollective.com/>)
I'm so glad I found the Plura app when I did. It was a total game-changer for us. Remarkably, ticket sales literally DOUBLED from our inclusion in their email newsletter. It was so awesome being able to engage with possible attendees, answer any questions, and get folks excited before the event. Thanks, Plura!
[Sarah Jane,Little Gay Book Events](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/littlegaybook.com/>)
## FAQ
### Who is Plura Community for?
We welcome everyone 18+ who shares our [community values](https://www.heyplura.com/</community-values>) and is looking for connection. On Plura, you can connect organically with burner, queer, artist, creative, polyamorous, wellness, kink, conscious, spiritual, and alternative communities through meaningful shared experiences. We strive to be inclusive for all sexual and relationship orientations, gender identities, and interests. You are welcome here.
### How much does Plura cost?
Plura is free to use, both to add events, discover events, and connect with people. 
We encourage you to consider joining as a SuperBloomer (premium membership) to unlock more advanced dating and events features. 
### How do I join?
First, download our app from the [App Store](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/id1528252601>) or [Google Play](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=community.together.bloom>). You can become Buds with people and chat 1:1. You can also join events - with your Buds or solo - and find people who are interested in the same events and experiences as you.
### What types of events are there?
We partner with event organizers to bring you a diverse collection of events to choose from - festivals, parties, live music, park hangouts, workshops, and more. Each event has a description that will help you know what to expect. You are also welcome to create your own public or private event pages on our app to share with your friends and community.
[See more FAQs](https://www.heyplura.com/</FAQ>)
## Ready to join?
[![Apple App Store](https://landen.imgix.net/shared/apple-en.png)](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/id1528252601>)[![Apple App Store](https://landen.imgix.net/shared/google-play-en.png?trim=auto)](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=community.together.bloom>)
## You are welcome here
A queer and woman-led company with community-driven values
Organic connections with burner, queer, creative, polyamorous, kink, conscious, and alternative communities
A safer and more inclusive place to meet new people
## Community values
### Consent
Plura is committed to upholding best practices for consent between our events, organizers, and users. Consent must be affirmative, competent, informed, unprepared, specific, and ongoing.
### Accountability
Specifically, Personal Accountability. We are risk aware, and respect our own and others’ boundaries. We take responsibility for our behavior. We seek to apologize well for the harmful consequences of our actions.
### Inclusion
Plura strives to be an empowering organization that platforms marginalized voices. We will not tolerate any sort of sexism, racism, transphobia, fatphobia, or ableism and are always trying to learn how the intersections of those identities inform our platform .
© 2024 Together Project, Inc.

generated_description:
**Plura: Connecting Edge-of-Culture Communities**

### What is Plura?

Plura, formerly known as Bloom Community, is a fresh social and dating app dedicated to edge-of-culture communities. This Y Combinator-backed startup from Oakland, CA, launched in 2020 with a vision to foster genuine human connections through shared experiences and events.

### Mission

Plura's mission is simple but profound: to create a social platform where people can meet new friends and partners naturally. The app encourages organic interactions during various events, effectively bypassing the frustrations of swiping and ghosting associated with traditional dating platforms. 

### How it Works

Plura collaborates with local event organizers to provide a space where users can engage before and after events, fostering a sense of community and safety. The focus here is on consent and respectful connections—fundamental values that are woven into the app's design.

- **Events**: Users can find and join a wide range of events—from queer gatherings and workshops to wellness activities—each designed to encourage real-life connections.
- **SuperBloomer**: For those looking to enhance their experience, there’s a premium membership option that unlocks additional features.

### Leadership

At the helm of Plura is Luna Ray, who has a noteworthy background, having led Instagram's rapid user growth at Facebook from 700 million to over a billion users within two years. This experience is instrumental in scaling Plura's community engagement.

### The Community

Plura is committed to creating a safe and inclusive space for everyone, welcoming individuals 18 and older from diverse backgrounds, including the queer, polyamorous, and kink communities. Their focus on consent and accountability adds a layer of trust and respect, making it a top choice for individuals seeking meaningful connections.

### Key Features

- **Event Discovery**: From queer munches and polyamory meetups to workshops on consent, users can explore a variety of events that align with their interests.
- **Connecting & Matching**: Instead of getting lost in the algorithm, users can meet like-minded individuals and deepen connections at events.
- **Community Values**: Plura actively promotes values like consent, accountability, and inclusion, ensuring all users feel safe and respected.

### Getting Involved

Joining Plura is straightforward. Users can download the app from the [App Store](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/id1528252601>) or [Google Play](https://www.heyplura.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=community.together.bloom>), where they can browse events, chat with others, and create their own gatherings.

### Conclusion

In the landscape of social applications, Plura stands out by emphasizing authentic human interaction over superficial engagements. By blending technology with community-building principles, it is redefining social connection for contemporary audiences. So if you're eager to meet your people through shared experiences, Plura might just be the right place for you.

To learn more, check out their website: [Plura](https://www.heyplura.com).
